categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Egan was a female Human who was a supply sergeant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. She was stationed in the city of Sobrik on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War.

Supply Sergeant Egan appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Level 14 Modifications Vendor for Imperial players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, she was removed from the game.
